ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:11}); // Lucrecia
“I wanted to disappear…
I couldn't be with anyone…
I wanted to die…”{PAUSE}“But the Jenova inside me
wouldn't let me die…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:12}); // Lucrecia
“Lately, I dream a lot of Sephiroth…
My dear, dear child.”{PAUSE}“Ever since he was born
I never got to hold him…”{PAUSE}“Not even once.
You can't call me his mother…
That…is my sin…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:15}); // Lucrecia
“{Vincent}…
Won't you please tell me?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:17}); // Lucrecia
“If Sephiroth is still alive?”{PAUSE}“I heard that he died five years ago.
But I see him in my dreams so often…”{PAUSE}“And I know that physically, like myself,
he can't die so easily.”{PAUSE}“Please, {Vincent}
tell me…”
